author: danielsh
msg: (s:svnLog):  Quote the "^/" differently.  This makes it work for me (and
hopefully doesn't break it for anybody else).

author: julianfoad
msg: Tweak my recently added Vim scripts, thanks to Daniel Shahaf's feedback.
(svnBlame): Remove call to "NoSpaceHi" which was an optional external
utility. Remove commented-out broken code. Add some comments.
(svnLog): Remove call to "NoSpaceHi" which was an optional external
utility. Echo a warning message properly instead of executing an
invalid command when there is no revision number under the cursor.

msg: Fix deprecation warnings in svndumpfilter, stop using svn_path_join.
node and copyfrom paths from the dumpfile.

msg: Teach svndumpfilter to accept glob patterns as path prefixes.
